environment.name: AOT_CONFIG_CONTENT
environment.value:
extensions:
  health_check:
  sigv4auth:
    region: "us-east-2"
    service: "aps"
    assume_role:
      arn: "arn:aws:iam::503706188161:role/traderlion-amp-remote-write-role"
receivers:
  awsecscontainermetrics:
    collection_interval: 20s
processors:
  filter:
    metrics:
      include:
        match_type: strict
        metric_names:
          - ecs.task.memory.utilized
          - ecs.task.cpu.utilized
exporters:
  prometheusremotewrite:
    endpoint: "https://aps-workspaces.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/workspaces/ws-f2cdd8d3-8fb8-45ce-b6a7-c817e00282d8/api/v1/remote_write"
    auth:
      authenticator: sigv4auth
service:
  extensions: [health_check, sigv4auth]
  pipelines:
    metrics:
      receivers: [awsecscontainermetrics]
      processors: [filter]
      exporters: [prometheusremotewrite]
